code: @Before public void setUpController() {     controller = new RestController(Collections.emptySet(), null, mock(NodeClient.class), new NoneCircuitBreakerService(), new UsageService()). }

comment: /**  * A test {@link RestController}. This controller can be used to register and delegate  * to handlers, but uses a mock client and cannot carry out the full request.  */
code: /**  * A test {@link RestController}. This controller can be used to register and delegate  * to handlers, but uses a mock client and cannot carry out the full request.  */ protected RestController controller() {     return controller. }

comment: /**  * Sends the given request to the test controller in {@link #controller()}.  */
code: /**  * Sends the given request to the test controller in {@link #controller()}.  */ protected void dispatchRequest(RestRequest request) {     FakeRestChannel channel = new FakeRestChannel(request, false, 1).     ThreadContext threadContext = new ThreadContext(Settings.EMPTY).     controller.dispatchRequest(request, channel, threadContext). }
